replies.body:
A lot of issues with the client on Mac OS tends to be caused by drops in your connection to the game platform. To ensure this is not the case, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac), as it lists the most common solutions for a poor connection.

Let me know if this caused any change.
